rules_text:
Flying
Ancestral Guide has lifelink as long as you’ve lost life this turn. [i](Damage causes loss of life.)[/i]
Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Ancestral Guide.
notes:
Reworked from Soul Food Chef

I’m a bit worried about this card’s ability to gain a bunch of life fast, but we’ll see in playtesting.
